# Flares

```{r, warning=F, message=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(lubridate)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
flares_data <- read_rds("../data/preprocessed/flares_data.rds")
tracts_sf <- read_rds("../data/preprocessed/tracts_sf.rds")
```

```{r}
#there are flares for each year-month-basin, no need to fill zero values
flares_data %>% 
  mutate(yyyy_mm = format(as.Date(date), "%Y_%m")) %>% 
  group_by(yyyy_mm, basin) %>% 
  summarise(flares = sum(flares)) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = ym(yyyy_mm), y = flares, color = basin)) +
  theme_cowplot() + 
  labs(title = "Total flares per month", x = "")
```

```{r}
flares_years <- flares_data %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date)) %>% 
  group_by(year, GEOID, basin, area, pop) %>% 
  summarise(flares = sum(flares)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(flares_concentr = flares / area)

#### you can only read these as concentration within tracts where there are flares!!!
ggplot(flares_years) + 
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = as.factor(year), y = flares_concentr, col = basin))
```


```{r}
time_grid_sf <- tracts_sf %>% 
  filter(GEOID %in% unique(flares_data$GEOID), 
         basin == "Permian Basin") %>% 
  select(GEOID) 

time_grid_sf %<>% 
  left_join(
    flares_years %>% 
      pivot_wider(id_cols = GEOID, names_from = year, values_from = flares_concentr)
  ) %>% 
  select(-GEOID)

spplot(as_Spatial(time_grid_sf))
```

```{r}
time_grid_sf <- tracts_sf %>% 
  filter(GEOID %in% unique(flares_data$GEOID), 
         basin == "Gulf Coast Basins") %>% 
  select(GEOID) 

time_grid_sf %<>% 
  left_join(
    flares_years %>% 
      pivot_wider(id_cols = GEOID, names_from = year, values_from = flares_concentr)
  ) %>% 
  select(-GEOID)

spplot(as_Spatial(time_grid_sf))
```
